dcs_cols_lookup

Source: R/query_dcs.R
dcs_cols_lookup.Rd

convert desired column names into DCS database column names, with table prefix

dcs_cols_lookup(cols)

Arguments

cols

A vector of desired column names

Details

An internal function that provides a vectorised lookup of column names. Non-matching column names are converted to NA and filtered out

Examples

dcs_cols_lookup(cols = c("reporting_organisation_code", "ccg"))
#> Error in case_when(cols == "reporting_organisation_code" ~ "IE.reporting_organisation_code",     cols == "ccg" ~ "org2.ORGANISATION_NAME as 'ccg'", cols ==         "hospital_site_name" ~
